name: HMCharacteristicValueLockMechanismLastKnownAction
desc: Possible values for the last known action of the locking mechanism.

items.name: case securedRemotely
items.desc: The last known action was for the lock to be secured remotely.

items.name: case securedUsingPhysicalMovement
items.desc: The last known action was for the lock to be secured using physical movement.

items.name: case securedUsingPhysicalMovementExterior
items.desc: The last known action was for the lock to be secured using physical movement on the exterior of the door.

items.name: case securedUsingPhysicalMovementInterior
items.desc: The last known action was for the lock to be secured using physical movement on the interior of the door.

items.name: case securedWithAutomaticSecureTimeout
items.desc: The last known action was for the lock to be secured automatically after a timeout period expired.

items.name: case securedWithKeypad
items.desc: The last known action was for the lock to be secured using a keypad.

items.name: case unsecuredRemotely
items.desc: The last known action was for the lock to be unsecured remotely.

items.name: case unsecuredUsingPhysicalMovement
items.desc: The last known action was for the lock to be unsecured using physical movement.

items.name: case unsecuredUsingPhysicalMovementExterior
items.desc: The last known action was for the lock to be unsecured using physical movement on the exterior of the door.

items.name: case unsecuredUsingPhysicalMovementInterior
items.desc: The last known action was for the lock to be unsecured using physical movement on the interior of the door.

items.name: case unsecuredWithKeypad
items.desc: The last known action was for the lock to be unsecured using a keypad.
